document.full_text: the operator of the stricken japanese nuclear power plant said on friday that more radioactive water could begin spilling into the sea later this month if there is a glitch in setting up a new decontamination system.
document.title: japan nuclear plant could leak more radioactive water
lines_and_colors: the operator of the stricken japanese nuclear power plant said on friday that more radioactive water could begin spilling into the sea later this month if there is a glitch in setting up a new decontamination system.
